s: Summary: Sentient Salon HK Edition gathers AGI builders, researchers and VCs for intimate, stage‑free dialogues on decentralized intelligence.
Topics: AI agent coordination, decentralized compute markets, blockchain governance, multi‑agent alignment, incentive design.
Speakers: AGI researchers, venture capital partners, blockchain protocol engineers.
r: Access cutting‑edge ideas on multi‑agent coordination without gatekeepers.
Forge collaborations with top AI and decentralization talent.
Explore funding pathways for decentralized AI infrastructure.
